item.description:
From the AMC's book Walk Boston..."On a hillside overlooking the Neponset River lies a little Victorian time capsule amid more modern structures - that part of Hyde Park known as Fairmount. This walk will take you up and down Farmount's steep streets on a trip back in time past stunning and fascinating structures." Sounds like a nice walk to me - I always like looking at nice old homes. I have driven nearby on Brush Hill Road and found it really pretty.

Meet in the parking lot of the Hyde Park commuter rail station at 3:00.

Afterwards we will have dinner at:

African Cuisine
1248 Hyde Park Ave
Hyde Park, MA 02136-2806
Phone: (617) 364-9999

They only open at 3 and sounded more interesting than anything else in the area, so we are doing a later walk - its all about the food this time!
item.name: Hyde Park & Victorian Faimount walk/African
